mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON M.ID_NUM = MR.ID_NUM WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{pw},#{pw})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ADMIN A JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON A.ID_NUM = MR.ID_NUM WHERE MR.ID = #{id} AND A.PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{pw},#{pw})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ONGOING WHERE MEM_JOIN_NUM IN (SELECT OG.MEM_JOIN_NUM FROM ONGOING OG JOIN MEM_JOIN MJ ON OG.MEM_JOIN_NUM = MJ.MEM_JOIN_NUM JOIN BUILD_ROOM BR ON BR.ROOM_NUM = MJ.ROOM_NUM WHERE MJ.ID_NUM = (SELECT MR.ID_NUM FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEM_REGI MR ON m.id_num = MR.ID_NUM WHERE MR.ID=#{id} ) AND BR.TRIP_END_DATE < SYSDATE)
